Name: schemaname
column6: name of schema containing materialized view

Name: tablespace
column6: name of tablespace containing materialized view (null if default for database)

Name: hasindexes
column6: true if materialized view has (or recently had) any indexes

Name: ispopulated
column6: true if materialized view is currently populated

Name: definition
column6: materialized view definition (a reconstructed select query)
